history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: funLattice,fun_leq,fun_bot. qsimpl time: 1 use: funLattice,fun_leq,fun_refl,fun_bot. qsimpl time: 1 use: funLattice,fun_leq,fun_bot,fun_trans,fun_refl. qsimpl time: 1 use: funLattice,fun_leq,fun_bot,fun_trans,fun_refl. qsimpl time: 1 use: funLattice,fun_leq,fun_bot,fun_asym,fun_trans,fun_refl.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : cpo x : A -> B Unable to unify "lattice" with "fun_leq fun_bot x".
In environment A : Type B : cpo x : A -> B The term "fun_leq fun_bot x" has type "Prop" while it is expected to have type "fun_leq fun_bot x".
In environment A : Type B : cpo s : A -> B P : forall (A : Type) (B : poset), (A -> B) -> (A -> B) -> Prop x : A -> B Unable to unify "forall x : ?M1561, ?M1563 x <== ?M1563 x" with "P A B s x".

original: apply funLattice. refine (fun_leq fun_bot x). ++ apply fun_refl. ++ apply fun_trans with (z:=x). -- apply fun_refl. -- apply fun_asym; auto.
